title: Can't purchase RP
body: So I tried buying RP this morning and it kept saying 'error occurred, please try again later'. I checked to make sure the card into was right, I had the right CVV, etc. I even tried re-entering the card information and NOW it's telling me I've made the maximum attempts, and I have to try again 24 hours later. I'm sorry, but I'm not waiting 24 hours to purchase RP. I promised a friend I'd buy them a skin today and I really don't want to make them wait considering they didn't make me wait when they gifted me a skin I really wanted. I'd really like to get this fixed, it's quite annoying :-/

replies.body:
Mornign ladykoraki - 

Are you still having trouble with this?

I'm having the same issue. Tried buying RP a few hours ago and encountered the error message, followed by the "please wait 24 hours" after a couple more attempts.

Is something up with the system?
Not sure what's going on - but I've let the team know so they can take a look into it. They're investigating.
I'm not sure, I haven't attempted in making any purchases anymore. I had a friend buy rp for me and I paid him back through the bank.
